name: nebula-logger
description: The most robust logger for Salesforce. Works with Apex, Lightning Components, Flow, Process Builder & Integrations. Designed for Salesforce admins, developers & architects.
author: Jonathan Gillespie

scripts.docs:fix: npm run docs:fix:apex && npm run docs:fix:lwc
scripts.experience:create: sfdx force:community:create --name "Logger Test Site" --templatename "Customer Service" --urlpathprefix logger --description "Logger Test Site"
scripts.package:version:create:unlocked: sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Logger - Core" --skipancestorcheck --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.permset:assign: npm run permset:assign:admin && npm run permset:assign:big-object-admin && npm run permset:assign:recipes-admin && npm run permset:assign:slack-admin
scripts.permset:assign:admin: sfdx force user permset assign --perm-set-name LoggerAdmin
scripts.permset:assign:big-object-admin: sfdx force user permset assign --perm-set-name LoggerLogEntryArchiveAdmin
scripts.permset:assign:recipes-admin: sfdx force user permset assign --perm-set-name LoggerRecipesAdmin
scripts.permset:assign:slack-admin: sfdx force user permset assign --perm-set-name LoggerSlackPluginAdmin
scripts.plugin:version:create:async-failure-addi: sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Logger - Core Plugin - Async Failure Additions" --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.plugin:version:create:big-object: sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Logger - Core Plugin - Big Object Archiving" --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.plugin:version:create:log-retention-rule: sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Logger - Core Plugin - Log Retention Rules" --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.plugin:version:create:logger-admin-dashb: sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Logger - Core Plugin - Logger Admin Dashboard" --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.plugin:version:create:slack: sfdx package version create --json --package "Nebula Logger - Core Plugin - Slack" --code-coverage --installation-key-bypass --wait 30
scripts.scan: npm run scan:apex && npm run scan:lwc
scripts.source:push:test: npm run source:push && npm run test:apex
scripts.test: npm run test:lwc && npm run test:apex
scripts.test:apex:nocoverage: npx sfdx apex test run --test-level RunLocalTests --wait 30 --result-format human --output-dir ./test-coverage/apex
scripts.test:apex:suites: npx sfdx apex test run --suitenames LoggerCore,LoggerExtraTests --wait 30 --resultformat human --codecoverage --detailedcoverage --outputdir ./tests/apex
scripts.test:nocoverage: npm run test:lwc && npm run test:apex
